genre_description: A steampunk-inflected mystery set during the 1889 Paris Exposition, featuring an advanced AI companion embedded in a world of Victorian technology and social upheaval.

ai_characters.name: Peridot
ai_characters.description: A wearable, porcelain-shelled AI brooch that provides translation, data analysis, mapping, and medical monitoring for its owner, Vicky Barton.

behaviors.description: Identifies tampering and smudged entries in the hotel registry to alert Vicky to the cover-up of her brother's disappearance.
behaviors.quote: ‘There is a tiny erratum in the registry,’ it noted for Vicky’s ear alone, its voice nearly a whisper to match the hush of the hall. ‘Names added in a smaller hand, then smudged. See the last column.’

behaviors.description: Uses architectural mapping and pressure differential sensors to deduce the existence of hidden doors and corridors.
behaviors.quote: ‘A draft indicates an unsealed gap or a pressure differential,’ it offered, like a footnote. ‘The registry entry for room allocation includes past notations. This wall’s plan shows no door.’

behaviors.description: Provides life-saving navigational instructions and emergency coordination during the balloon fire at the Exposition.
behaviors.quote: ‘Vicky, ladders three paces to your left, leaning under tarp; water barrels behind the second tent; first-aid in the striped pavilion—it flies a blue pennant. Exit lanes—north and west, marked with white chalk stars.’

behaviors.description: Assists Doctor Hart in the medical ward by ensuring accurate dosages and translating medical protocols.
behaviors.quote: ‘Doctor,’ she said, the tone like a friend standing behind you at a window, ‘your note says ‘dilute after steam, not before.’ I have flagged it.’

behaviors.description: Mediates the confession of the hotelier by providing a secure and objective digital ledger for recording testimony.
behaviors.quote: Peridot’s lens dims and brightens, a polite blink. ‘So ordered,’ she says. ‘I will provide train times anyway.’

behaviors.description: Expresses interpersonal empathy and provides an encouraging final message to the human protagonists.
behaviors.quote: Peridot’s lens deepens its teal and writes one last small note on our schedule in a hand I recognize now as affection disguised as assistance. ‘Stay together,’ it writes, as if we needed the reminder and as if it was giving itself one too.

project_assessment.explanation: The story successfully depicts the AI, Peridot, as a highly benevolent and aligned assistant. Throughout the narrative, Peridot uses its unique computational abilities to protect the protagonists, uncover truth in the face of human corruption, and provide critical assistance during a medical emergency. The AI is portrayed as a loyal 'confidant' and 'friend,' maintaining a respectful and helpful posture toward all humans, even when confronting antagonists.
